# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(AMR_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(AMR)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
AMRPluginInfo.C
AMRCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
AMRPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
AMRMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtAMRFileFormat.C
EOS.C
AMRreaderInterface.C
AMRreader.C
AMRreaderLowRes.C
AMRreaderBlkConso.C
AMRreaderLowResBlkConso.C
AMRreaderWithLevels.C
OctKey.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
AMREnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtAMRFileFormat.C
EOS.C
AMRreaderInterface.C
AMRreader.C
AMRreaderLowRes.C
AMRreaderBlkConso.C
AMRreaderLowResBlkConso.C
AMRreaderWithLevels.C
OctKey.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IAMRDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IAMRDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IAMRDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MAMRDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MAMRDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MAMRDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MAMRDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EAMRDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EAMRDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EAMRDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EAMRDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EAMRDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EAMRDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EAMRDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EAMRDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases AMR ${INSTALLTARGETS})
